title: Problem-Solving Skill Enhancement Course Based on Cerebral Dominance: Application in the Language Domain

context.prior_knowledge: Basic statistical interpretation skills and experience with job-related language use
context.additional_context: Optimizing language problem-solving strategies for professionals in medical/legal/technical fields based on individual brain dominance types.

learning_goals: Learners identify their cognitive preference types with 80% accuracy using a brain dominance diagnostic tool within six months.
Learners apply and evaluate strategies aligned with their brain dominance characteristics three or more times when solving language problems through project-based tasks.
Learners improve and incorporate two or more problem-solving approaches into the final project outcome by reflecting on peer feedback.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
